name: BULLET TRAIN
information: Five assassins aboard a fast moving bullet train find out their missions have something in common.

name: PARADISE HIGHWAY
information: A truck driver has been forced to smuggle illicit cargo to save her brother from a deadly prison gang. With FBI operatives hot on her trail, Sally's conscience is challenged when the final package turns out to be a teenage girl.

name: DC LEAGUE OF SUPER-PETS
information: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.

name: ROOM 203
information: Two best friends and roommates are terrified by the vengeful spirits dwelling in their apartment. Based on the novel published by Kobunsha and written by Nanami Kamon.

name: MINIONS 2: THE RISE OF GRU
information: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.
